title: Out & About Gets Horned Up On ZBT | Hot or Not? Military Generals
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 4 Round in the magazine ... ROUND 1: We know Russia is yanking men off the street now to send to war… but did they also scoop up ONE BILLION OF OUR CRABS?! ROUND 2: We have special guests from Out & About on for a historical game of Don’t Ask, Do Tell ROUND 3: The members of the world’s top K-pop band are being sent for their mandatory service in the South Korean Army & their fans are losing their SHIT ROUND 4: Does your uniform keep ripping & falling apart? Well perhaps you’ve fallen victim to an NYC man who ran a scheme selling over $20M in counterfit Chinese-made U.S. military gear SUPPORT THE SHOW: WhistlePig Whiskey - Get your bottle at https://barstool.link/WPZBT or at a local retailer.
